abstract: Wireless chip developer SiBeam stuck with longtime backers for the third time, on Monday, April 7, announcing that it closed a $40 million Series C round of funding to support commercial production of low-cost chips used to power high-bandwidth video transmission.
lead_paragraph: Wireless chip developer SiBeam stuck with longtime backers for the third time, on Monday, April 7, announcing that it closed a $40 million Series C round of funding to support commercial production of low-cost chips used to power high-bandwidth video transmission.

headline.main: SiBeam Adds $40 Million in New Funding
